I apologize for my mistake. Here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Disease" in the given paragraph:

| --- |
| torsade de pointes (TdP) |

I have removed "early afterdepolarization (EAD)" as it is not a disease, but rather a cardiac phenomenon that can lead to the development of certain arrhythmias, including torsade de pointes.
